pageContext.claim: “[Biden] wants to abolish borders. Think of that. Stop all deportations and prosecution of illegal border crosses, support sanctuary cities, incentivize illegal alien child smuggling, provide taxpayer funded lawyers for illegal alien.”
pageContext.analysis: Biden's plan does not propose abolishing borders or stopping deportations entirely nor does it incentivize child smuggling — much of which happens at legal ports of entry. Our colleague Philip Bump reported “the only mention of lawyers in relation to immigrants in the unity platform appears to be that immigration courts should allow for remote attorney appearances.”
